flawed_nl_solution:
Since one out of every 3 rows will contain tomato plants, there will be 15 / 3 = <<15/3=5.0>>5.0 rows of tomato plants.
This gives her enough room to plant 5.0 rows * 8 plants/row = <<5.0*8=40.0>>40.0 tomato plants.
The plants will produce a total of 40.0 * 3 = <<40.0*3=210.0>>210.0 tomatoes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120.0, not 210.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
